thread.title: Morris gets passing game duties on offense
thread.title_full: Morris gets passing game duties on offense

author: D. Orlando Ledbetter
title: Morris gets passing game duties on offense
text:
FLOWERY BRANCH Raheem Morris was named wide receivers/passing game coordinator/assistant head coach Friday.
Morris, who is entering his 15th season in the NFL and his third with the Falcons, was the assistant head coach/wide receivers last season. In his first season, he was assistant head coach/passing-game coordinator on defense.
Heâ€™s getting added responsibilities on the offense, with Steve Sarkisian being named as the offensive coordinator Tuesday.
